form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Woodland Furniture Manufacturing, Inc. / 223215 Early Ave. / Torrance, Calif. 90503 / 326-4200 / 775-3621

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/10/2023 Woodland Manufacturers of Quality Furniture WOODLAND FURNITURE MANUFACTURING, INC. / 23215 EARLY AVE. / TORRANCE, CALIF. 90503 / 326-4200 / 775-3621 May 4, 1970 To Whom It May Concern: This is to verify that FOIA (b)(6) has been employed here at Woodland Furniture Manufacturing Inc. since FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) He is considered a permanent employee in our shipping department. Since his starting date, FOIA (b)(6) has earned several in- creases in salary and at the present time is earning $108.00 for a 40 hour week. FOIA (b)(6) He is well liked by his co-workers and is very effient. FOIA (b)(6) can retain his position for as long as he wants. We are happy to have him in our employ as he is very stable and a dependable employee. Star Steven J . Duben General Manager Margaret L. Dall'Orso NOTARY PUBLIC . CALIFORNIA PRINCIPAL OFFICE IN LOS ANGELES COUNTY MARGARET L. DALL' ORSO My Commission Expires May 18, 1971
